/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The road itself is a two-lane highway, divided by a median, guiding the flow of traffic. 

On either side of the road, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. Parked cars line the sides of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene.

In the distance, a large green sculpture stands out against the urban landscape. Its intricate design and vibrant color make it a focal point in the background. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene, looking up at the towering sculpture and the expansive sky.

Despite the busyness of the scene, there's a sense of order and harmony. The elements - the road, the trees, the cars, the pedestrians, the sculpture - all coexist, each contributing to the unique character of this street in Beijing.
